title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When applying the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter in a table with a datetime column, an error message is thrown.
OB: An error message is displayed when attempting to use the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter based on a datetime column.
EB: The system should allow using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in table filters without throwing an error message.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a datasource and a dataset that contains a datetime column.
2. Insert a table component.
3. Add a filter to the table based on the datetime column.
4. In the filter's value field, enter the value new Date("3/2/2005") and press Enter.
